title: 3D Game-Based Advanced Education on Water Quality Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic water quality management knowledge and practical experience in environmental science
context.additional_context: Field-Oriented Training for Practitioners, Enhancing On-Site Problem-Solving Skills via Team Collaboration and Simulation in 3D Game Environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify pollution sources with 80% accuracy by analyzing water pollution causes in a 3D game-based simulation
Learners can design water quality improvement plans through game-based collaborative tasks and incorporate them into PBL reports
Learners can interpret virtual experimental data in games and propose at least three water management strategies applicable to real-world contexts
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
